title: I bouht a phone pixel 2xl on 2018and then i change to different brand so i gave to my pixel to my b
content: I bouht a phone pixel 2xl on 2018and then i change to different brand so i gave to my pixel to my budy to use couple days but now so what happen is i try to sign in my gmail account it wont let me in and even i try my budy phone to open lock still dont let me in to so how i m gone unlock my pixel 2xl so I can at least used it even I try to talk customer supports he said we can't do nothing with it even I have the original copy to recipet that I actually buy this phone from Google store unlock
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
